   <span class="module-path">libela.operations.</span>
   <div class="api-title">strain_converter</div>

.. _strain_converter:

strain_converter
================
Strain Converter: Converts strain tensors to a format suitable for hyperelastic stress computations in lib-ela.

.. currentmodule:: libela.hyperelastic.operations
.. autofunction:: libela.hyperelastic.operations.strain_converter
   :no-index:
